divs: Sighting Details I had started to leave my house when went out the frount door, and I saw lights comming up the valley where we live as thye craft got closer i could see lights on the side of the craft Ithought this is odd because airplanes have ligts on the front and on the wing tips unlike this craft, witch had them on the side of the main body. at frist i thought it was somesort of hover craft thyen i saw a red glowing orb escourting it or this vehichle was escourting the orb i don't know which i know the larger craft was very heavey because of the percussion of the props. If this is not some secret transport why would they not doit in the day. It appears they where following i59 north.
Summary: i know it was notlike any airplane or crtaft i had seen before.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lakeland
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
